page.title: 10Sunday:Gringley-on-the-Hill
page.content: Mr C.G.Sisum is a Deputy Head at Ordsall Hall Comprehensive School.He's lived in "Kippax Cottage",Gringley for 6 yrs.He originates from Malmesbury. Once a month he goes to Church for the 9-30am Family Service.Hannah,his daughter goes to Sunday School.Sunday lunch is one of the few times his family has a main meal together: usually a traditional meal of roast chicken/beef/pork & two veg.& dessert. Afterwards,Mr&Mrs Sisum take Bramble, their dog for a walk along the Chesterfield Canal.Their children Tom & Hannah,aren't keen on walking so they stay at home.In the summer the family go sailing at Torworth with other staff & pupils from Ordsall Hall School.Sometimes Mr Sisum goes swimming with his children,plays squash/tennis,or works in the garden. { P.T.O.
